attributes.action: Using Natural Bodybuilding to encourage health in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, call upon the United Kingdom Government to recognise that natural bodybuilding not only encourages teenagers and young people to take pride in their physical health, but can also be used to prevent youth crime and urge the Minister for Sport to actively promote the sport as a possible candidate for inclusion in any future bid for the Commonwealth Games in England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland
